title: Making the Case for 'Mythic Quest'
description:
Juliet Litman is joined by Chris Ryan to discuss the newest special episode of the Apple TV+ workplace comedy 'Mythic Quest.' They also talk about the difference in Apple's approach to TV that makes it unique.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
